# <code>uppercase</code> for dataframe

<div class='command-title'>Uppercase the strings in the column</div>

## Signature

```> uppercase```

## Flags

 * ```-h, --help```: Display this help message
## Examples

  Modifies strings to uppercase
```shell
  > [Abc aBc abC] | into df | uppercase
```
